comments:

problems so far, when I call it as root. But calling it as normal user brings up
the following:

This error does not occur when eclipse and ve are being installed in my home
directory. This may indicate an access rights problem.

I installed RC2 with VE I20040614, GEF SDK I20040610, emf-sdo-xsd SDK I200406100948

I get this error when I try to launch an editor with the cdt pluging app.  It
just started after I "upgraded" to RC1.  It is also in RC2.

I'm running on Redhat 9

Mine is installed in my home directory, and every file is owned by me.  Could it
be some permission bits are needed?  I don't know if unzip will set them like
tar can...

Have you tried this with the latest VE Stable build to see if you still have the
problem?
http://download.eclipse.org/tools/ve/downloads/drops/S-S20040622-200406221415/index.html

VE 1.1 has been released and no further info has been supplied to us. If this
still occurs with VE 1.1 please reopen the defect.
